name: how to tell someone you're not okay
name_original: how to tell someone you're not okay
description:
a interactive guide about telling your friends you're not okay

by katie moses.

trigger warning: suicidal ideation.

--

(please play before reading)

talking to people is extremely hard. trusting people with your emotions, and having that trust reciprocated in the way you want, is terrifying. thank you for taking the time to play.
